# Country App

<p align="left">
  <img height="200" src="data:image/jpeg;base64," />
</p>


## Made with

-React 
-Redux 
-Node
-Express
-PostgreSQL 
-Sequelize.


## Functions

Using the external [restcountries](https://restcountries.eu/) API we can:

  - Search Countries
  - Filter / Order
  - Create touristic activities
